name: Pocketon Peak
description:
Welcome to Pocketon!

Here you'll meet new people, fight strange monsters, solve some puzzles and go on a fetch quest or two (like any good rpg!)

Made in about 60 hours for Ludum Dare 45.

Bwalter | SalamiChild | BibikiGL

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Look: (Arrow keys)
  • Item select: 1,2,3
  • Use item: (space) or E
  • Drop Item: Q

Change Log: 

v1.6: First Post-Jam Patch. Fixes missing Shell and Forest Collision bugs.

v17: attempt to fix a spawn glitch resulting from getting damage-pushed through a doorway.
